scripts.build: npm run build:packages && npm run compile
scripts.build:packages: npm run build:main && npm run build:preload && npm run build:renderer
scripts.build:main: npm run update_vendors && cd ./packages/main && vite build
scripts.build:preload: npm run update_vendors && cd ./packages/preload && vite build
scripts.build:renderer: npm run update_vendors && cd ./packages/renderer && vite build
scripts.deploy: env-cmd -e prod electron-builder build --publish always --config electron-builder.config.js
scripts.clean: npm run clean:tmp && npm run clean:dist
